summary: Mini isn't eager to wed the rich suitor who's been chosen for her, so she stages her own kidnapping and runs off with a man who works for her father.
cast: Riteish Deshmukh|Genelia D'Souza|Om Puri|Tinnu Anand|Diljit Dosanjh|Smita Jaykar|Satwant Kaur|Veena Malik|Chitrashi Rawat|Gurmeet Saajan
title: Tere Naal Love Ho Gaya
